bibl.bibl: Saporta, Gaston de. 1867–8. Études sur la végétation du sud-est de la France. Annales des sciences naturelles (botanique) 5th ser. 8 (1867): 5–136; 9 (1868): 5–62.
bibl.idno: SF6 P382.c.45 There are 3 more articles in this series, but they do have the "a l’époque tertiare", and are a supplement so won’t cite unless needed.
